title: The Bunker (1981) [Anthony Hopkins as Hitler] DVDrip
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0082114/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0082114/</a>

Anthony Hopkins as Hitler during the dramatic last days of his life. Who else could depict the symbol of evil, if not Hannibal Lecter? Superb acting early in Hopkins' career in this rare film.

English subtitles in separate idx/sub files.
Fullscreen, color, original mono sound.
Xvid 496x352, 23.976 fps, AC3.
The film is 144 minutes long, so I'll give it 800 Mb.
Burn tested, runs well in my divX player.
